video.title: Love (ft. Marriage and Divorce)
video.synopsis: Everything comes unraveling for three successful women who work on a radio show as twists, turns and troubles plague their seemingly happy marriages.

episodes.synopsis: Sa Pi-young demands that Mo Seo-hyang leave the country. Park Hae-ryun startles Lee Si-eun with an unexpected request to end their marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Si-eun makes a last-ditch effort to save her marriage. Suspicious of Pan Sa-hyeon's late night at the office, Boo Hye-ryung drops in.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Hye-ryung demands answers from an unfaithful Sa-hyeon. Park Hyang-gi's plea tugs at Hae-ryun's heartstrings. Pan Mun-ho reunites with Kim Dong-mi.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With a sonogram, Sa-hyeon tries to convince his parents to be in favor of his divorce. Dong-mi turns a cold shoulder to Shin Gi-rim's call for help.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Dong-mi's crocodile tears fool both kith and kin at the funeral, especially Shin Yu-sin. Hye-ryung refuses to grant Sa-hyeon a divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Si-eun warns Hae-ryun to keep his affair a secret from their kids. Pi-young notices Yu-sin's increasing devotion toward Dong-mi.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Hyang-gi boldly confronts her father after having a change of heart. Hye-ryung's sudden visit to the emergency room jolts Sa-hyeon back to reality.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Having seen enough, Pi-young puts the brakes on Yu-sin and Dong-mi's close bond. Mun-ho waits for a text message that never comes.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: A run-in on the plane reminds Yu-sin of his first encounter with an aspiring model. Sa-hyeon is captivated by an attractive gym-goer.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Yu-sin lies about his airplane seatmate. Hurt by Mun-ho's apathy, So Ye-jeong packs her bags in a huff. A new professor dazzles Hae-ryun.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Concerned about A-mi's hangover, Yu-sin drops off food before work. Sa-hyeon and Song Won exchange numbers over breakfast.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: A-mi confesses her feelings for Yu-sin before a trip back home. Sa-hyeon treats Won to dinner, where she tearfully opens up about her hardships.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: A-mi's lonely birthday turns into a romantic night with Yu-sin. Sa-hyeon finds himself comparing Won's warm personality with Hye-ryung's cold attitude.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Sa-hyeon and Won comfort each other about past and present marital issues. Hae-ryun accompanies Nam Ga-bin to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Promising to stay by Won's side, Sa-hyeon proposes a new kind of relationship. Hae-ryun jumps at the chance to make a house call for Ga-bin.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Ga-bin yearns for Hae-ryun's warm embrace to mend her broken heart. Won bares her soul to Sa-hyeon, who's set on filing for divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Won, Ga-bin and A-mi open up to each other about their relationships. Hye-ryung turns to her in-laws to get her marriage back on track.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The housekeeper tells an incredulous Dong-mi about seeing the late Gi-rim in the home. Sa-hyeon introduces Won to his mother.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Won and Sa-hyeon tearfully agree to call it quits. Using her husband's apparition as an excuse, Dong-mi moves into Yu-sin's home.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Mun-ho insists on meeting the mother of his future grandchild himself. Hae-ryun reveals his girlfriend's identity to a pained Si-eun.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Si-eun and Ga-bin meet face-to-face as Hyang-gi eavesdrops nearby. On a movie set, an actor wearing a familiar-looking coat catches Pi-young's eye.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Yu-sin puts an expiration date on his relationship with A-mi. Si-eun has bad news for Pi-young: a warning about her husband's possible infidelity.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Pi-young asks Yu-sin about the woman he was seen with at the equestrian club. Won, Sa-hyeon and Hye-ryung unexpectedly cross paths at a restaurant.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: A fuming Hye-ryung grills Won about the affair. Hearing of her mother's condition, Pi-young rushes to the hospital... and sees Yu-sin in A-mi's room.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Pi-young is rendered speechless by her husband's betrayal. Ga-bin introduces Hae-ryun to A-mi, whom he recognizes from the equestrian club.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Devastated and determined, Pi-young presents Yu-sin with an ultimatum: Take her to A-mi's house, or go to the courthouse to file divorce papers.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A-mi's meeting with her biological father goes sour when questions arise about a mutual acquaintance. Yu-sin packs up his bags to give Pi-young space.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Yu-sin pleads for a second chance while Pi-young recounts how his unforgivable infidelity robbed her of a parting moment with her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Hye-ryung gives Sa-hyeon her blessing. A-mi offers her friendship to Pi-young and proves to be a formidable opponent for Dong-mi.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Ga-bin shares devastating news with Seo Dong-ma. Hye-ryung's tearful press conference turns the public against Sa-hyeon.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Yu-sin feels betrayed seeing his ex-wife out with another man. Hye-ryung surprises co-workers with her feelings for Ban. Dong-ma stays by Ga-bin's side.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Yu-sin finds reasons to frequent Pi-young's apartment. Ga-bin's recent loss gives her a realization about marriage. Won goes into labor.
episodes.title: Episode 16
